transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Kya naam hai aapka mam company naam bataiye aap?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ji sir hum IndiaMART se baat kar rahe hain.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Haan sir aapki Priyanka mam se baat hui hogi aapne call kiya tha IndiaMART ki team mein.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Right to unhone aapko guide kar diya tha ki aapki services start ho gayi hai.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: One years ke okay to abhi jaise abhi aapko by lead assign agar nahi hui hai to do char din me aapko by lead assign ho jayengi aur abhi verification call jayegi aapki profile pe aur aapki services jo hai trust seal certificate generate hoga fir wo aapki aapke office area pe wo courier kar diya jayega right iske alawa koi by lead me issue to nahi hai sir aapko?
Customer: Nahi trust seal to abhi nahi mili hai.
Executive: Haan trust seal abhi nahi mili hai right by lead aapko.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Right abhi sir verification hoga uske baad aapko by lead uske according aapko provide hoga jo mam se maine bola ki mujhe matlab particular abhi start nahi chahiye trust seal kuch der baad chahiye to unhone kuch update diya us cheez ke regarding.
Executive: Haan actually humne baat kiya tha to unhone bola sir actually jo services hoti hai wo one years ki complete services hoti hai right beech me jo process hota hai wo hold ka nahi hota hai koi.
Customer: Beech me kaha abhi to start bhi nahi hui hai trust seal mam.
Executive: Haan sir in fact aapka jo paisa diya gaya tha class ka renewal jo hai wo end ho chuka tha right.
Executive: To uske baad aapne complete services liya hai okay to yaha par hold ka koi process nahi hai aapki services jo rahengi wo continuously on going rahengi.
Executive: Ye cheez hai.
Executive: Agar aapko chahe to fir aapko panch din busy rahenge to aap apni listing pe kaam kar sakte hai tabhi aapki trust seal team aapke sath connect hongi wo verification hoga certificate generate hoga aur aapka jo products hai keywords hai us pe hum log kaam kar sakte hai jaise ki abhi aapke paas agar time rahega to apni profile ko aur highlight kar sakte hai ki aapke area me jitna aap uri nahi sir jo first first week me aap by lead ko connect karenge wo on the spot close ho jaye.
Executive: It take already time to trust seal sab process hone me aapko thoda time lagega abhi aur us time aap catalog pe work kar sakte hai apni catalog pe time de sakte hai ye rahega to jitna aap matlab ab ye hai ki usme nahi ho sakta hai na.
Executive: Sir aapki services start matlab ye on going hai na matlab beech me koi process nahi hai hum log hold ka hum log ke hath me koi authority nahi hoti hai beech me hold karne ki.
Customer: I think matlab trust seal to abhi start nahi hua hai na.
Executive: Services trust seal ki.
Executive: Trust seal ke sirf by lead allocate nahi hoti aaj verification aapka hota hai verification hoga fir aapki jo by leads hai wo assign hongi fir proper trust seal aapki services me jo hai wo ho gaya hai sir.
Customer: Matlab trust seal start ho gaya hai.
Executive: Yes sir trust seal jo hai wo trust seal services aapke live ho gaye hain.
Executive: Right iske alawa koi aur issue sir?
Customer: Nahi theek hai.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: Okay theek hai agar koi issue hota hai to kya aapka jo ticket aapne call kiya tha IndiaMART me wo hum close kar de jo aapne call ke liye agar aapko koi bhi issue ho kuch bhi ho to aap direct number pe call kar sakte hai right.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Theek hai mai aapko like aapka jo ticket hai wo close karti hu aur aapke paas ek feedback jayega to now you are satisfied with the resolution.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Okay lekin sir are you satisfied with that?
Customer: Yes mam.
Executive: Okay okay theek hai okay thank you for this.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer states TrustSeal services not yet started.



Resolution:

- Explained TrustSeal process starts with verification.

- Clarified services are for one year, no hold option.

- Suggested working on catalog while TrustSeal is processed.

- Confirmed TrustSeal services are now live.



Next Steps: 

- Ticket will be closed; feedback form to be sent.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- trustseal, verification, services, byleads
